entry.dcterms:title: National Social Science Survey About the Australian Population 1984
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-B74: National Social Science Survey About the Australian Population 1984. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Cushing, Robert G.
Headey, Bruce
Kelley, Jonathan
entry.dcterms:description: respondent's demographical data, social expenditures, governmental expenditures, social and economic expenditures; the respondent's and his/her family's moves, dwelling history, background of moves, spoken languages, parents' job and education; respondent's schools and job, where and with whom he/she lived up to the age 14, job at age 30, present job and income; satisfaction, health and human contacts, politics; sentiments towards political leaders and social groups; religious and moral expenditures; data on marriage and children; society membership, conditions of education
entry.dcterms:subject: migration
science and technology
cultural and national identity
person
survey data
cross-section
Two-stage random sample out of the 1981 census sample containing appr. 10000 persons. Only one person aged 18 years or more has been selected from each household.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
